elements.name: Verify User can add an item to cart

steps.name: User change the category to 'Smart Home'

User click on item
User select quantity adding '2’
User click add to Cart button
The cart icon quantity should change to '2’

elements.name: Verify User can place an order with Shipping address and payment Method on file​​​​​​​

steps.name: User change the category to 'Electronics'
User search for an item 'Apex Legends'
User click on Search icon
User click on item
User select quantity ordering '5'
User click add to Cart button
The cart icon quantity should change to ordering '5’
User click on Cart option
User click on Proceed to Checkout button
User click on Place Your Order
A message should be displayed 'Order Placed Successfully'
A confirmation page should be displayed 'Order Placed Thanks'
User is on retail website
User click on Sign in option
User enter email 'jason5@gmail.com' and password 'Canada@1234'
User click on login button
User should be logged in into Account
